name: GlobaLeaks
description: GlobaLeaks is free, open source software enabling anyone to easily set up and maintain a secure whistleblowing platform

sdgs.relevance: GlobaLeaks is a free and open-source whistleblowing software enabling everyone to report safely and anonymously about wrongdoings encountered during their own life and work experience. The technology has already enabled worldwide more than 4000 organizations to create projects focused on anti-corruption, gender based violence, environmental crimes, war crimes. Please see the attached link that list some of the most valuable use cases and please reach out to get to know more.

NonPII.nonPIIAccessMechanism: Supports a REST API for data access

dataPrivacySecurity.collectsPII: PII data is NOT collected NOT stored and NOT distributed.

userContent.contentManagement: Content is NOT collected NOT stored and NOT distributed.

protectionFromHarassment.harassmentPolicy:
- Code of Conduct: https://github.com/globaleaks/GlobaLeaks/blob/main/CODE_OF_CONDUCT.md
- Contributing Guidelines: https://github.com/globaleaks/GlobaLeaks/blob/main/CONTRIBUTING.md
- Governance Model compliant with best open source guidelines: https://github.com/globaleaks/GlobaLeaks/blob/main/GOVERNANCE.md
- Best Practices adopted by the project: https://bestpractices.coreinfrastructure.org/en/projects/3816

openStandards: The software is build in compliance with with ISO 37002

specific whistleblowing standard defined in 2021. It as well implement whistleblowing procedures in relation to many national and international laws and in particular in relation to the Directive (EU) 2019/1937.

Within its implementation it uses only standard protocols defined by the IETF
bestPractices: Full documentation about the principles and best practices used within the project development: https://bestpractices.coreinfrastructure.org/en/projects/3816
